item.title: 通过systemd 管理 docker-etcd
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 参考 ### # make sure etcd process has write access to this directory # remove this directory if the cluster is new; keep if restarting etcd # rm -rf /tmp/etcd/s1 # to write service file for etcd with Docker cat > /tmp/s1.service <<EOF [Unit] Description=etcd with Docker Documentation=https://github.com/coreos/etcd [Service] Restart=always RestartSec=5s TimeoutStartSec=0 LimitNOFILE=40000 ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker \ run \ --rm \ --net=host \ --name etcd-v3.3.0-rc.0 \ --volume=/docker/etcd/s1:/etcd-data \ gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.3.0-rc.0 \ /usr/local/bin/etcd
